summary: MY FIRST MOD!!! ok so adds a deadpool follower. it does require a mod from steam workshop (deadpool race version 2) and the latest skyrim update or else your game will crash
descriptionHtml:
[i]I need a volunteer for voice acting and custom dialog so pm me or comment. thanks
[/i] requires skse and a mod from steam workshop called (deadpool race version 2)
hes at the winking skeever in solitude. Send in those screenshots are I wanna see how the mod is working for you. Please any deadpool fans that would like to voice act. Pm me.                                 UPDATE: still waiting for someone to voice act so cmon guys.
author: alexander24287
